trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element used for grouping other <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> elements.
**Content Model:** <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> enforces a strong content model for child content.
Child elements contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element must be derived from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>.
Valid child elements include:
See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> object model.
Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"></xref> containing the top-level <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection"></xref> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref>
This property has no default value.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether or not a trailing paragraph break should be inserted after the last paragraph when placing the contents of a root <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section"></xref> element on the clipboard.
This property is only applicable to the root <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element within flow content.
This property has no effect on non-root <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> elements contained within flow content.
**true** to indicate that a trailing paragraph break should be included; otherwise, **false**.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A serialization service manager object for this object.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks"></xref> property should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Raised when manager is `null`.
